hints.text: A small flying passive mob
Collects and delivers items for players
Spawns near Pillager Outposts and Woodland Mansions
Can be found in dark oak cages or jail cells
Follows the player and seeks dropped items of the same type
Responds to note block sounds within 16 blocks
Cannot enter water, but attempts to gather items underwater
Regenerates health at a rate of 2♥ per second
Drops items it was holding upon death
Can be duplicated using an Amethyst Shard and a dancing Allay
A passive bucketable aquatic mob
Found in lush caves and spawns near clay blocks
Comes in different colors: pink, brown, gold, cyan, and blue
Can assist players with aquatic combat and grant them Regeneration
Attacks most other aquatic mobs, except turtles, dolphins, and frogs
Can play dead to regenerate health and ignore hostile aquatic mobs
Can leave water and wander on land in search of deep water
Vulnerable to Impaling enchantment and can cause nearby pufferfish to inflate
Can be bred using buckets of tropical fish and lead
Spawns with different color variants, including leucistic and blue

spawn_conditions: Clay block less than 5 blocks below spawning space

hints.text: A flying ambient passive mob
Spawns in dark areas underground
Hangs upside down on solid blocks when idle
Does not drop any items or experience upon death
Squeaks randomly and flies around aimlessly
Despawns when too far away from the player
Can fly into lava and catch on fire
Flies away if approached by a player or if its hanging block is broken
Spawns more frequently between October 20 and November 3 as an Easter egg
Collision boxes do not interact with players or redstone components

spawn_conditions: Light level of 3 or less in neighboring blocks
October 20 – November 3: light level of 6 or less in neighboring blocks

hints.text: A passive mob found in villages and swamp huts
Can be tamed and used to repel creepers and phantoms
Spawns in villages with fewer than 5 cats and inside swamp huts
Comes in different variants: black, tabby, tuxedo, red, siamese, etc.
Immune to fall damage and avoids falling off cliffs
Can see players even with Invisibility status effect
Avoids and hisses at phantoms, repelling them
Creepers and phantoms avoid cats, keeping a distance
Can be tamed with raw cod or raw salmon
Teleports to the player if more than 12 blocks away
A passive mob found in grass biomes
Drops chicken, feathers, and eggs
Can be bred using wheat seeds, beetroot seeds, melon seeds, or pumpkin seeds
Spawns in groups on grass blocks with 2 blocks of free space above
Avoids falling off cliffs and is immune to fall damage
Follows players holding seeds
Pursued and attacked by ocelots, untamed cats, and foxes
Lays eggs every 5 to 10 minutes
Thrown eggs have a 1/8 chance of spawning a baby chicken
Baby chickens grow into adults in 20 minutes and can be accelerated with seeds

spawn_conditions: Grass blocks with 2 blocks of free space above

hints.text: A common bucketable aquatic mob found in oceans
Drops raw cod when killed, cooked cod if killed while on fire
Can be collected using a water bucket
Spawns in groups underwater, subject to fish spawning requirements
Weakness: Cannot survive outside of water and takes suffocation damage after 10 seconds
Can be placed in a water bucket and emptied to create a water source with swimming cod
Vulnerable to weapons with the Impaling enchantment
Sometimes drops bone meal (Java Edition) or bones (Bedrock Edition)
Can swim in water but cannot survive in waterlogged blocks
Spawns in different ocean variants, including cold, lukewarm, and deep oceans

spawn_conditions: Underwater in normal, cold, and lukewarm oceans, and their deep variants
drops: Cooked Cod (if killed while on fire)

hints.text: A passive mob found in grassy biomes
Drops leather, beef, and milk
Spawns in herds on grass blocks with space above them
Can be bred using wheat and follows players holding wheat
Avoids environmental hazards but does not avoid explosions
Can be milked using a bucket
Has a chance of spawning as a calf
Vulnerable to attacks and runs away when harmed
Drops raw beef, steak, and leather when killed
Spawns in most grassy biomes except snowy taigas and plains

spawn_conditions: Grass blocks with at least two blocks of space above them
